name: GetInputCurrent
info:
Reading GetInputCurrent 
It reads the four current input channels from 4mA to 20mA.

Via Api:**http://192.168.1.201:3005/api/megaind-rpi.getOutputCurrent?**

Via Transporter call daq.riin
Transporter Nats: **{"transporter":"nats://192.168.1.201:4222"}**

Array position:
0 = sensor PIT129 tank pressure T02
1 = sensor PIT118 line pressure
2 = sensor LIT125 tank level T01
3 = sensor FIT116 flow rate
